channel.title: Can you make a forum website-- nvm just read
channel.description: can you make a forum website without the account registering feature (which makes an ignore account on the forum) and then add this feature later? i mean can i make a forum website and then edit it later to have the account registering feature?

item.title: Can you make a forum website-- nvm just read
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

Yes you can. You will want to have an identifier in the players table that represents the “owner” forum account.

Read full topic
item.source: Can you make a forum website-- nvm just read
